nodes.text: A New Ally (French: Un nouvel allié) is a chapter book adaptation of the Star Wars Rebels episode "The Lost Commanders". A New Ally was published by Hachette Jeunesse on April 13, 2016.

The situation is complicated for Ezra and his companions, relentlessly hunted down by the Empire! They absolutely need a backup base. To find one, Ahsoka decides to call upon an old friend of hers. But Kanan does not take long to discover that it is a clone, therefore an enemy of the Jedi…
Despite being written by Vanessa Rubio-Barreau, Amazon France mistakenly states that the author was Walt Disney.
